CONFIGS.enter_the_date_of_record: Enter the date of making the record
CONFIGS.number_row_per_page: Display paging at the list screens
CONFIGS.number_digits_after_decpoint: Displays how many numbers after the decimal point
CONFIGS.decpoint_is_dot: Use comma as a comma (,) after thousands, million, billion, trillions, million billion, billion and billion (.) After the unit digit in the invoice. For example: 5,500,456.40 đ
CONFIGS.display_int: Do not display the decimal part when the decimal part has a value of 0. For example: 5,000,000.00 => 5,000,000
CONFIGS.money_decimal_format: Displays the total payment amount in decimal format. For example: 5,000,000.55
CONFIGS.send_mail_after_export_invoice: After issuing an electronic invoice, always send an email to the buyer
CONFIGS.merge_receipt: Print a5 invoice slip on a a4 sheet
CONFIGS.allow_keep_invoice_number: Allow to display information invoice waiting for signing
CONFIGS.view_provisions_on_accounts: Displays the code column that identifies the billing form
CONFIGS.dont_display_conversion_name: Do not show the conversion printer's name
CONFIGS.display_transport_number: Display the number of orders, ship names
CONFIGS.view_bank_account_seller: Allows changing the bank account of the seller when invoicing
CONFIGS.time_export_inv: Limit the time allowed to sign the invoice number
CONFIGS.show_more_columns: Show more columns on the grid:
CONFIGS.email_note: (Note: In case of using Gmail or Yahoo, there is a limit to the number of emails sent per day, maximum is 500 Email / day. In case of sending more, your Email may be locked in 24 hours)
CONFIGS.is_address_search_ecloud: Address lookup invoice using Ecloud's provider
CONFIGS.email_ex: (Example: supplier link https://ihoadon.vn/kiem-tra/?shd=0000000&mtc=F55F0E9BA4, in which: ihoadon.vn is the address, 0000000: Invoice number, F55F0E9BA4: Is the search code bill)
CONFIGS.email_header: The configuration of sending an electronic invoice to the buyer
CONFIGS.email_config_auto: The automatic configuration of sending email to the buyer
CONFIGS.customize_time_send_email: Customize the time of send email (The system automatic sends email the outstanding invoice to customer follow the set milestones below):
CONFIGS.display_time_sign_invoice: Display the sign time on invoice
CONFIGS.role_branch: Quản lý khách hàng và người sử dụng theo từng chi nhánh (Nếu chọn thiết lập này thì khách hàng của chi nhánh nào thì NSD của chi nhánh đó mới nhìn thấy được)
CONFIGS.convert_to_vnd: List of goods and services sold (01_1/GTGT): Convert value to VND
CONFIGS.delivery_bill_print: Allow to print the Delivery note in each invoice (Applying PXK according to Circular No. 133/2016 / TT-BTC dated August 26, 2016 of the Ministry of Finance)
CONFIGS.gen_adjust_invoice_for_multiple_invoice: Generate adjusted invoices for multiple invoices
CONFIGS.send_file_in_email: Invoice sending email with invoice zip file attached
CONFIGS.price_after_discount: Calculate the unit price after discounting according to the total discounted amount of goods
CONFIGS.donot_display_zero: Do not display zeros in the decimal part (Example: 5.555,560 -> 5.555,56)
CONFIGS.the_same_number_of_voucher: Check the same number of documents when loading invoices from excel
CONFIGS.price_after_vat: Calculated according to the unit price after tax
CONFIGS.is_regex_pass: Increase the security of the software user password
CONFIGS.no_display_zero_at_the_decimal: No display number 0 at the decimal section (Ex: 5.555.560 display 5.555,56):
CONFIGS.display_vat_other: Display the tax rate Do not declare and pay tax as KKKNT and Others is KHAC (Meet the requirements of the Ho Chi Minh Tax Department)
CONFIGS.display_recepts_no: Display the recepts no, amount, amount vat column on the invoice list
CONFIGS.display_read_money_english: Read amount in words in English (Read English only for foreign currencies)
CONFIGS.display_the_order: Displays the Number of Orders column on the invoice list
CONFIGS.digitally_sign_the_delivery: Digitally sign the delivery order on the software
CONFIGS.set_time_change_password: Set the time required to change the user's password:
CONFIGS.change_password_first_login: The user must change the password when logging in the software for the first time
CONFIGS.sign_both_unit_and_storekeep: The internal PXK signs the unit signature and the export storekeeper's signature at the same time (This configuration is only available when the export storekeeper has a personal signature)
CONFIGS.integrate_sign_delivery: Integrate to sign delivery confirmation minutes
CONFIGS.display_contract_order: Display contract order on table goods
CONFIGS.not_display_am_on_invoice: Do not show '-' sign on reduced adjustment invoice
CONFIGS.check_payment_status: Manage invoice payment status (Integrated units only)
CONFIGS.display_vat_kct: Display vat as KCT (Applicable to contracts according to TT78)
CONFIGS.display_operator_plus: Invoices that are adjusted to increase will be displayed +
CONFIGS.enable_send_wrong_cancel: Automatically send error notifications to tax authorities when Canceling invoices
CONFIGS.enable_send_wrong_process: Automatically send error notifications to tax authorities when processing invoices
CONFIGS.process_not_in_software: Invoicing replacement/adjustment for invoices that are not available in the software
CONFIGS.information_that_is_not_filled_in_left_b: On the PDF invoice view, any information that is not filled in is left blank (Not displayed /)
CONFIGS.view_multi_invoice: View multiple invoices on the same PDF view interface
CONFIGS.allow_to_print_delivery_each_invoice: Allow to print delivery minutes in each invoice (Special minutes form of Gia Anh company)
CONFIGS.is_send_uncompressed_file_attachment: Invoice email has attached file but not compressed file
CONFIGS.do_not_send_file_with_tax_code: Do not send attachments to buyers with Tax code
CONFIGS.is_add_other: Put other total taxes, other total fees of the airline ticket agency invoice template in the DSLPhi tag in the invoice XML
CONFIGS.is_add_product_code: Add row code column for adjusted invoice
CONFIGS.not_export_more_than_a_month: Not export more than a month
CONFIGS.is_seller_sign_bill: Invoice generated from cash register: Seller sign invoice

LABEL.suggestion_check_content_invoice: It is recommended that the unit carefully check the contents of the imported invoice before exporting such as: Invoice date, Buyer, Name of goods and services, Total amount, etc. to avoid incorrect export.

LABEL.notify_TT78: From November 2021, the General Department of Taxation will compel the unit to convert electronic invoices to the new standard according to Circular 78/2021/TT-BTC (data on e-invoice will be synchronized directly to the agency).
LABEL.convert_apply_TT78: To ensure proper operations and avoid risks, units urgently review and
LABEL.request_processing_invoice_exist: issue all invoices waiting to be signed before the time of application of e-invoices according to TT78
LABEL.notify_provice_convert: Based on the notice of the General Department of Taxation, units in the following provinces will convert to apply electronic invoices according to Circular 78/2021/TT-BTC in the period from November 2021 to March 2022: Hanoi City; Ho Chi Minh City; Quang Ninh; Hai Phong; Phu Tho and Binh Dinh
LABEL.to_convert_to_do_steps: To convert to apply invoices according to Circular 78/2021/TT-BTC, the unit needs to do the following steps:
LABEL.step_1: Step 1: Submit registration for use of electronic invoices to the Tax Authority
LABEL.step_2: Step 2: Create invoice templates according to Decree 123/2020/ND-CP
LABEL.step_3: Step 3: When registering to use e-invoices accepted by the Tax Authority, cancel the invoices
LABEL.begin_use_invoice_TT78: After completing the above steps, the unit can start using invoices according to Circular 78/2021/TT-BTC
LABEL.convert_success_TT78: You have completed the conversion and can issue invoices according to TT78
LABEL.cancel_invoice_tt32: Cancellation of outstanding invoices according to TT32
